sys_sg_write_back_action_item.name: New (Password Policy)
sys_sg_write_back_action_item.template: maximum_password_length={{Password Policy maximum_password_length}}^minimum_lowercase_characters={{Password Policy minimum_lowercase_characters}}^minimum_numeric_characters={{Password Policy minimum_numeric_characters}}^minimum_special_characters={{Password Policy minimum_special_characters}}^minimum_uppercase_characters={{Password Policy minimum_uppercase_characters}}^minimun_password_length={{Password Policy minimun_password_length}}^name={{Password Policy name}}^password={{Password Policy password}}^password_policy_script={{Password Policy password_policy_script}}^password_rule_script={{Password Policy password_rule_script}}^password_strength={{Password Policy password_strength}}^password_strength_script={{Password Policy password_strength_script}}^pwd_rule_hint={{Password Policy pwd_rule_hint}}^strength_rule={{Password Policy strength_rule}}^whitelisted_special_characters={{Password Policy whitelisted_special_characters}}^EQ
